scripts.package: docker build . -t cte-linux-amd64 --platform linux/amd64 && docker save -o cte-linux-amd64.tar cte-linux-amd64
scripts.containerised: npm run build && npm run compose
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-auth && npm run install-ticket && npm run install-vehicle && npm run install-permit && npm run install-lot && npm run install-driver-app && npm run install-admin-app && npm run install-enforcement-app && npm run install-police-api && npm run install-registrar-api
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-auth && npm run ci-ticket && npm run ci-vehicle && npm run ci-permit && npm run ci-driver-app && npm run ci-admin-app && npm run ci-enforcement-app && npm run ci-police-api && npm run ci-registrar-api
scripts.lint: npm run lint-auth && npm run lint-ticket && npm run lint-vehicle && npm run lint-permit && npm run lint-driver-app && npm run lint-admin-app && npm run lint-enforcement-app
scripts.build: npm run build-auth && npm run build-ticket && npm run build-vehicle && npm run build-permit && npm run build-driver-app && npm run build-admin-app && npm run build-enforcement-app && npm run build-police-api && npm run build-registrar-api
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-ticket" "npm run start-vehicle" "npm run start-permit" "npm run start-driver-app" "npm run start-admin-app" "npm run start-enforcement-app" "npm run start-police-api" "npm run start-registrar-api"
scripts.test: npm run test-services && npm run test-app
